meta.title: Roxstein
keywords: best web design agency in Switzerland

hero.description: When Swiss quality meets global talent, websites are created that deliver results – for more visibility, more customers, and measurable growth.
hero.cta2: Call now for a no-obligation consultation

services.title: Services
services.description: Projects realized by us, according to our customers' specifications.

design.title: Design
design.description: We design websites that not only look good, but also perform: clear, well-thought-out, and user-friendly. From minimalist layouts to eye-catching icons – every element helps your customers find their way quickly and understand your offerings. This creates an experience that remains memorable.

dev.title: Development
dev.description: We perfect the technical aspects of your website: cleanly programmed, fast-loading, and reliable on all devices. Whether it's CMS integration, custom functions, or animated elements – we implement everything to ensure your website remains high-performing and low-maintenance in the long term.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.description: We manage the operation of your website – secure, stable, and supported. From the initial launch to daily availability, we accompany you with reliable hosting, regular maintenance, and personal support.

why.title: Our Advantages for You.
why.tagline: How we can enhance your company's growth.
why.description: With Roxstein, you can bring your ideas more quickly to
why.last: and transform visions into measurable results.

reason3.title: Creative Perfection
reason3.description: At Roxstein, creative sensibility meets solid craftsmanship. We combine creativity with strategic thinking to develop digital experiences that authentically reflect your brand – clear, distinctive, and targeted. This is how design is created that not only looks good, but works!

reason4.title: Swiss Quality Assurance
reason4.description: No compromises on stability and precision: We test every website thoroughly – on all devices, in all common browsers, and under real-world conditions. From performance and security to usability, we carefully check all details before your website goes live.

value.title: Our Commitment
value.tagline: More Impact. More Results. More than just a website.
value.description: At Roxstein, the focus is not on the product, but on the result. We develop websites that deliver real business value: clearly structured background processes, greater agility in daily operations, and digital results that advance your business. Our commitment? To ensure your investment is not just worthwhile – but pays off.
value.descriptionMobile: At Roxstein, the focus is not on the product, but on the result. We develop websites that deliver real business value: clearly structured background processes, greater agility in daily operations, and digital results that advance your business. Our commitment? To ensure your investment is not just worthwhile – but pays off.

contactPage.tagline: Together, we will shape the next step.
contactPage.description: Do you have a project, an idea, or a question? Send us an inquiry or email us directly at , and we will get back to you promptly.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.tagline: Get to know Roxstein and the team.

years.title: Experience
years.description: Roxstein has been established for two years – however, our experience extends far beyond that. It consists of a team of experienced professionals with comprehensive expertise in design, development, and digital strategy.

clients.title: Satisfied Clients
clients.description: Driving brand success through innovative and high-performance solutions.

values.title: Our Values at Roxstein
values.description: At Roxstein, we are guided by clear principles that shape our daily actions and offer you, our client, real added value.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Roxstein brings together a global team of experts with diverse backgrounds and skills.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.tagline: We value transparency and compliance with legal regulations.
imprint.description: References and links to third-party websites are outside our area of ​​responsibility. We disclaim any responsibility for such websites. Access to and use of such websites is at the user's own risk.

language.title: Language
language.value: The German version of the imprint is binding.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer for
disclaimer.value: References and links to third-party websites are outside our area of responsibility. We decline any responsibility for such websites. Access to and use of such websites is at the user's own risk.
